item.title: NYT Wants You To Feel Very Sorry For This Drug-Dealing Kidnapper Trump Deported
item.description: He made bad choices and is owed no sympathy. He owes the U.S. thanks for the opportunities he was given even after conviction.

item.title: Gun Control Doesn’t Stop Shootings Outside The United States, So It Won’t Here Either
item.description: Targeted attacks on schools are not uniquely American. They are global phenomena driven by evil, not geography or firearms laws.

item.title: Judge Strikes Down Illinois Law Requiring Pro-Life Doctors To Promote Abortion
item.description: A judge struck down Illinois' abortion promotion mandate as a violation of the First Amendment in a resounding victory for free speech.

item.title: The Nonprofit Hijacking America’s 250th Birthday Celebration Is The 1619 Project On Steroids
item.description: Leftist organizers see America’s 250th anniversary as a major cultural battlefield to push political agendas instead of celebrations.

item.title: RFK’s Controversial Description Of Autism Is Exactly Why The Spectrum Needs To Be Broken Up
item.description: The autism spectrum is so broad that the term 'autistic' no longer paints a discrete picture of what’s being described.
